name: RGBSpace
description:
Using this game I will be presenting themes that will be present in a much larger scale project that will be released some time after the release of this game. In this game the main goal is simply to maneuver a small cube across a grid to the end goal. However simply doing this will not reveal to the player what lies behind this games simplicity.

The theme "Out of control" is represented in this game in a few aspects, for one, the players movement, after pressing a direction, unless another arrow is pressed the character will not stop movement until a wall is hit.  Another way this theme is explored is hidden within one of the secret characters as some would consider them to be out of control, this is elaborated on with key design features in every level.
